entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: 1337Rinz/darkmode-extension: Simple Dark Mode Toggle is a lightweight extension that lets you enable dark mode on any website with just one click. 🌙 Features: One-click toggle between Light and Dark modes Automatically remembers your preference for each site Clean and elegant design with anime-inspired icons No tracking. No ads. Just dark mode.
entry.content: Simple Dark Mode Toggle is a lightweight extension that lets you enable dark mode on any website with just one click. 🌙 Features: One-click toggle between Light and Dark modes Automatically remembers your preference for each site Clean and elegant design with anime-inspired icons No tracking. No ads. Just dark mode.
